nodes.text: H3-4L was a male Vendor droid selling his wares in the Training Room of the Jedi Temple, using Coruscant Mission Tokens as a currency.

H3-4L first appeared in "Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures (video game)" as a consumables vendor in the Jedi Temple training room, using Coruscant Mission Tokens as a currency. The name H3-4L resembles the word "heal".
